body.p: IFRS 16 amends the scope of IAS 40 by defining investment property to include both owned investment property and investment property held by a lessee as a right-of-use asset. A summary of the IASB’s considerations in developing the amendments to the scope of IAS 40 is described in paragraphs BC178–BC181.
